recipes.name: Garlic Lemon Chicken
recipes.instructions: 1. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. 2. In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté minced garlic until fragrant. 3. Add chicken breasts and cook until browned on both sides. 4. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the chicken. 5. Serve garnished with chopped parsley.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Parmesan Chicken
recipes.instructions: 1. Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper. 2. In a skillet, melt butter and sauté minced garlic until golden. 3. Add chicken breasts and cook until almost done. 4. Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the chicken and sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. 5. Cover and cook until chicken is fully cooked. 6. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.
